body:
Comment 4: 
Hello,

I have just completed a build of go1.1.1 without incident on a raspbmc install. I don't
know which version, it auto updated itself to whatever it felt was a good choice.

Would you be able to give as much detail about your login environment as possible and/or
try the build again with a new user agent and/or new install?
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Started**._
